```{r fig11b, fig.cap="four-week Location history of two people, collected with Google Timeline", out.width = "100%", fig.asp = .4}
library(emaph)
library(ggplot2)
d <-  subset(locations,
              accuracy <= 100 &
              lon >=  4.80 & lon <=  5.00 &
              lat >= 52.25 & lat <= 52.50)

 ggplot(d, aes(lon, lat)) +
   geom_point(alpha = .1,  shape = 21, size = 3) +
   facet_wrap(~ id)
```
